name: Luck Simulator (Card ALS)
description:
Want to do something? Wait. Look at the good luck trend indicator. Maybe now is not the best time... 
As you know, there are no scientific ways to calculate luck. But nothing prevents you from modeling the process. Relax and choose a slider position. Watch. Find out how lucky you are now. During the day. Over the years (The game will run in the background most of the time and does not need advanced graphics (expect minimal computer load)
